item.title: Schnorr Signatures
item.description: Slides: https://residency.chaincode.com/presentations/Schnorr_Signatures.pdf https://twitter.com/kanzure/status/1165618718677917698 Introduction I’m Elichai, I’m a resident here at Chaincode. Thanks to Chaincode for having us and having me. Most of you have probably heard about Taproot and Schnorr which are new technologies that we want to integrate into Bitcoin. Today I am going to explain what is Schnorr and why do we even want this? Digital Signatures Before that we need to define what are digital signatures. In 1976 Whitfield Diffie and Martin Hellman published a seminal paper called New Directions in Cryptography.
